titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Sugar Ray Robinson should be recognized for his athletic achievements and commitment to young people.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Declares the sense of the House of Representatives that Sugar Ray Robinson should be recognized as one of history's greatest professional boxers.
